title: Benefits of Business Apps for Mobile and Web | Google Workspace
text: Do your best work, all in one place. Included applications Security and management Add-ons Google Workspace makes working together a whole lot easier. Make decisions faster, face to face. Use sharedÂ Â to see when others are available and schedule meetings with automaticÂ Â invites.With one click, turn your meeting into aÂ Â from any camera-enabled computer, phone, or tablet.Share your screen to review your work as a team, and make decisions on the spot. Collaborate in real-time. Easily work onÂ ,Â , andÂ Â across your devices, with or without internet.Work in a single document with teammates or people outside your company. See edits as others type, communicate through built-in chat, and ask questions in comments. Multiple people can work at the same time, and every change is saved automatically. Store and share files in the cloud. Keep all your work in one place with secure access from your computer, phone, or tablet. Quickly invite others to view, download, and collaborate on any file â no email attachment needed. File updates are automatically saved and stored inÂ , so everyone can always have access to the latest version.Secure your data and devices. Protect your companyâs data with security options like 2-step verification and single-sign-on, and useÂ Â to keep your data safe in the case of a lost device or employee turnover.Â email messages and on-the-record chats, and control how long they are retained. Easily configure security settings from a centralizedÂ , and call or email Google support for help 24/7.Add-ons Communicate more effectively with Voice. Let Voice take the extra work out of business communications. Send and receive phone calls using a work number on any device, from any location. Get accurate voicemail transcriptions and smart spam filtering from Googleâs AI. Assign numbers and manage service and billing through one platform. Voice is sold separately as an add-on to Google Workspace.
